items.name: Monrovia Discovery Lab
items.short_description: An interactive science center where children can explore physics, chemistry, and biology through hands-on experiments and engaging exhibits.

items.name: Liberia Tech Explorers
items.short_description: A modern hub where kids learn about robotics, coding, and engineering through playful challenges and building activities. Ignites young minds in technology.
items.address: Congo Town Road, Paynesville, Montserrado County, Liberia

items.name: Coastal Ecology Center
items.short_description: Dedicated to marine life and coastal ecosystems, this center offers educational exhibits, touch tanks, and interactive displays about Liberia's aquatic biodiversity.

items.name: Stars of Africa Observatory
items.short_description: Gaze into the Liberian night sky with telescopes and learn about constellations, planets, and space exploration through engaging presentations and simulations.

items.name: Kru Folk Tale Gardens
items.short_description: Wander through lush gardens adorned with sculptures depicting famous Kru folk tales. Audio stories bring the characters to life, offering a unique cultural experience.

items.name: Palm Tree Story Circle
items.short_description: An open-air venue nestled under towering palm trees, where local griots and storytellers share traditional Liberian legends and moral tales.

items.name: Legends of the Mano River
items.short_description: Discover the mythical creatures and heroic sagas inspired by the Mano River region. Interactive exhibits and animated displays recount ancient tales.

items.name: Journey of the 'Returnees' Park
items.short_description: A historical storytelling park chronicling the journey and settlement of the Americo-Liberians, featuring educational plaques, reenactments, and historical figures.

items.name: Jungle Explorer Maze
items.short_description: Navigate a thrilling maze filled with lush greenery, rope bridges, and hidden clues. Solve puzzles to find your way out and become a jungle master.

items.name: Diamond Mine Quest
items.short_description: Embark on a themed escape room adventure set in a simulated diamond mine. Work together to solve riddles, find hidden gems, and escape before time runs out!

items.name: Pirate's Cove Challenge
items.short_description: A water-based adventure park featuring climbing nets, splash zones, and an obstacle course. Kids can pretend to be pirates searching for lost treasure.

items.name: Mount Nimba Ascent
items.short_description: An indoor climbing facility designed for children, offering various wall challenges and bouldering routes. Experience the thrill of scaling a mountain safely.
items.address: Duport Road, Paynesville, Montserrado County, Liberia

items.name: Young Lone Star Field
items.short_description: A dedicated mini soccer pitch for children to practice their skills, play friendly matches, and learn the fundamentals of Liberia's favorite sport.

items.name: Beach Volley Kids Zone
items.short_description: Sandy courts perfect for children to enjoy beach volleyball, build sandcastles, and participate in other beach-themed games in a safe environment.

items.name: Hoop Dreams Junior
items.short_description: Mini basketball courts with adjustable hoops, designed for young enthusiasts to practice shooting, dribbling, and playing the game of basketball.
items.address: S.D. Cooper Road, Old Road, Monrovia, Liberia

items.name: Track & Field Tykes
items.short_description: A small, safe track and field area where children can try various athletic activities like sprinting, long jump, and mini hurdles, fostering a love for sports.

items.name: Liberian Dino Discovery
items.short_description: Step back in time to an age of giants! This park features life-sized animatronic dinosaurs, fossil digging sites, and educational exhibits about prehistoric life.

items.name: Jurassic Jungle Safari
items.short_description: Take a thrilling guided tour through a simulated jungle, encountering realistic dinosaur models hidden among the foliage. An immersive adventure for all ages.

items.name: Prehistoric River Monsters
items.short_description: Focuses on ancient aquatic creatures and marine dinosaurs that once roamed Earth's waters. Features impressive models and interactive displays.

items.name: Pangea Playland
items.short_description: A dinosaur-themed playground with slides, climbing structures, and interactive elements. Kids can play alongside friendly dinosaur figures.

items.name: Monrovia Children's Zoo
items.short_description: A small, friendly zoo featuring local Liberian wildlife and a few exotic species. Designed for young visitors to learn about animals and conservation.

items.name: Farm Friends Petting Zoo
items.short_description: Get up close with friendly farm animals like goats, sheep, and chickens. Children can feed and interact with the animals in a safe, supervised environment.
items.address: Old Road, Paynesville, Montserrado County, Liberia

items.name: Rainforest Rescuers Habitat
items.short_description: A sanctuary for rescued and rehabilitated local rainforest animals. Learn about biodiversity and the importance of protecting Liberia's natural heritage.

items.name: Critter Corner Liberia
items.short_description: An indoor exhibit showcasing smaller, unique creatures from Liberia and beyond, offering educational talks and supervised handling sessions.

items.name: Afro-Toon Heroes Hall
items.short_description: Meet and greet your favorite local cartoon characters and superheroes! Enjoy interactive shows, photo opportunities, and exclusive merchandise.

items.name: Fantasy Forest Friends
items.short_description: Step into an enchanted forest where magical creatures and beloved cartoon characters come to life for hugs, stories, and unforgettable encounters.

items.name: Superhero HQ Liberia
items.short_description: Train with your favorite international superheroes, participate in fun challenges, and get awesome photos. Unleash your inner hero!
items.address: Paynesville Omega Community, Montserrado County, Liberia

items.name: Princess Palace Pop-Up
items.short_description: A magical experience where children can meet their favorite princesses, enjoy storytelling, sing-alongs, and dress-up sessions.

items.name: Joyful Journey Carousel
items.short_description: A classic merry-go-round with beautifully painted horses and whimsical creatures, offering a delightful and gentle ride for young children.

items.name: Palm Grove Ferris Wheel
items.short_description: A mini Ferris wheel offering panoramic views of the surrounding park and palm trees. A gentle thrill for younger visitors.
items.address: S.D. Cooper Road, Old Road, Monrovia, Liberia

items.name: Congo River Rapids Ride
items.short_description: A gentle water ride that simulates a journey down a river, complete with splashes and mild twists. Perfect for cooling down on a warm day.

items.name: Miniature Train Express
items.short_description: All aboard for a scenic ride! This miniature train takes children and parents on a charming journey around the park, spotting various attractions.
items.address: GSA Road, Paynesville, Montserrado County, Liberia

items.name: Liberia Little Big Top
items.short_description: A vibrant, animal-free circus showcasing talented acrobats, clowns, jugglers, and illusionists, bringing joy and wonder to all ages.

items.name: Kente Puppet Playhouse
items.short_description: Experience the magic of traditional Liberian puppetry. Hand-crafted puppets tell engaging stories, often with moral lessons and cultural insights.

items.name: Magic Lantern Theater
items.short_description: A unique theater specializing in shadow puppetry and light shows, creating mesmerizing visual stories that captivate the imagination.

items.name: The Jester's Jamboree
items.short_description: An interactive performance space featuring comedic acts, juggling, magic tricks, and audience participation, ensuring laughter and fun for all.

items.name: Build-It Blocks Bay
items.short_description: A massive free-play area filled with countless LEGO bricks of all shapes and sizes. Kids can unleash their creativity and build anything they imagine.
items.address: Congo Town Back Road, Monrovia, Liberia

items.name: Master Builder Workshop
items.short_description: Guided workshops where children learn advanced LEGO building techniques, participate in themed challenges, and even dabble in LEGO robotics.

items.name: Junior Architect's Yard
items.short_description: An outdoor construction zone equipped with giant foam blocks, large wooden bricks, and soft play elements, perfect for toddlers and preschoolers to build big.
items.address: Duport Road, Paynesville, Montserrado County, Liberia

items.name: Imagination City Lego
items.short_description: Explore a miniature city built entirely from LEGO bricks, featuring famous Liberian landmarks alongside fantastical creations. Interactive displays and photo ops.
